title: Statement from Press Secretary Karine Jean-Pierre on the Bilateral Meeting Between President Joe Biden and President Andrés Manuel López Obrador of Mexico | The White House
content: President Joseph R. Biden, Jr. will meet with President Andrés Manuel López Obrador of Mexico for a bilateral meeting in San Francisco on November 17 on the sidelines of the APEC Economic Leaders’ Week.  During the meeting, the two leaders will discuss ongoing efforts to strengthen the U.S.-Mexico bilateral relationship and address issues of shared concern. President Biden and President López Obrador will also discuss how we can continue to work together as partners to manage migration at our shared border and mobilize a hemispheric-wide response to this challenge.###
